reviews.sentence: Ok airport hotel. Rooms design very nice and cozy. Air conditioning was noisy. could not switch off itCoridors was dirty. But the room was nice.

Greatest hotel to stay in jax. This is probably the only hotel i stay while i m in jacksonville. The rooms are clean the bed is so comfortable that you just do nt want to get up in the morning. The only thing the hotel should do is have a better shower head cause it felt like needles.

Not the expected Aloft experience. Staff untrustworthy. I normally stay at the Aloft because I like the room setup and the beds are comfortable. This Aloft experience was different. The room was clean but the shower could be re grouted. First let me say the front desk staff was welcoming. However I do feel the maid staff should be credited the same. I ended up getting the flu during my stay. So I only had the staff come in a couple of times during the week since I did not want to get them sick. Anyway one day I left my watch in my room. I normally put it on before I leave but this time I forgot to due to my illness. My watch is now missing and I filed a report with the hotel. Never heard back from them. I am not sure if it was the maid staff or someone else within the hotel staff that took my watch. I know that there is a safe for valuables but I never intended leaving my watch behind. It would be nice to not have to be concerned about your things within you room. The topper to all this is the maid staff did not even clean the room well when they didI will never stay here again.
The place is nice and in a good area were all the businesses at very easy to find will always come back here staff is good also and quite in the rooms.

Stayed here this weekend and really enjoyed it. Our rooms were nice and clean. The staff was very friendly and helpful as far as my husband and I needing directions to various places in the area. The hotel is in a great location and walking distance to many restaurants walmart shopping stores whatever so that was a plus. The only thing that I did not like was our room did not have a microwave so we had to use the microwave in the front lobby but other than that I would stay here again.

Clean Quick Easy. We planned to stay on Amelia Island but waited too late to make reservations for a room in Fernandina Beach. Aloft was only 20 minutes away we still had dinner in the historic harbor district of Fernandina and a short drive after dinner to Aloft. We had never stayed at Aloft and were pleasantly surprised with the modern millennial design we are a young 60. The lobby bar was perfect for after dinner drinks and we truly enjoyed a couple of 8 ball racks at the pool table. The room was efficient with all the important amenities 42 TV and plenty of privacy in the bathroom with room to turn around in the walk in showerWe will visit Aloft again. Modern design and nine foot ceilings.

Aloft Hotels Exceptional. Whenever traveling I find the Aloft Hotels to be exceptional when needing a room for just a night or two. The staff are welcoming the rooms very comfortable and they accept points or points payments if you wish. Very accommodating.
First time at Aloft Will stay again. Great Space. Friendly staff comfy rooms.

Good quality exc staff just too few of them. I stay at this hotel any time I am passing through Jacksonville and will do so again. Hotel was near full. Room ready when we arrived friendly staff. Hotel bar was good but was being manned by someone who was also assigned to the front desk so service at the bar was less than what I usually expect from them. I do not know if the bartender was out sick or if they are limiting the number of staff they hire. I really think with the hotel being so full there should have been a bartender assigned to just that post. Room was great. Comfortable bed cool views out the floor to ceiling windows and was convenient to many restaurants and shopping.

Nice hotel. The media adapter was easy to use and made hooking the laptop to the television a breeze. The staff was friendly and the room was clean. The free WiFi was slow and had issues streaming movies.
Dirty room poor service and overpriced.

The hotel is very clean and well taken care of. The beds were comfortable. However I picked the wrong bed to sleep in. There is a table over the AC unit so when it kicks on it blows air directly to one of the beds. I had to sleep completely under the covers so I could breathe and not be so cold. it is not constant. It turns on and off thoughout the night. The bathroom did not have a tub. I do not know if that is just because the room they put me in was handicap accessible. However I had a baby with me so she had to shower with me. Not a big problem just did not expect that. There is not a microwave in the room. You have to use the one in the lobby. But there is a mini fridge and a safe. So those were useful. The room was very big. Again I had a handicap accessible room. I was able to fit the pack n play no problem. I also had to check out a day earlier than scheduled and they were very accommodating. Front desk staff was great.

Eclectic And Comfortable. This hotel had an eclectic and hip vibe. Pool tables and a cool bar in the lobby. A change of pace from the run of the mill hotel room. The room was clean and bed was a little hard but did not impact my sleep. The window seat is the only option aside from the desk chair to sit. The a c was wonderful and so too was the walk in glass shower. The hotel is convenient to plenty of shopping and restaurants and the airport is just a few miles away. I thought the breakfast was a little lacking but enough to start the day.

Expected it to be as nice as their other properties. Stayed at other Aloft in Jacksonville and enjoyed it. The airport location appears poorly maintained. Entered room and almost tripped over slack capet ridges. Headboard of bed had numerous claw marks as if a large dog went wild. Same marks on wall next to desk. TV had about 40 channels but less than half were clear. Reported TV issue to front desk first day. Returned that evening an no improvement on TV. Went to front desk and there was no record of a maintenance concern. Checked out and mentioned it again and just got a blank stare. Will stay at nearby Crowne Plaza in the future.

I would not stay here again. The rooms are disgusting. The management team and owner should ashamed. The location was great. The hotel room was disgusting. it was in comparison staying at a super 8 or red roof or worst but paying holiday inn room pricing.

Small room but whoever designed it made great use of the space. Quiet and clean besides some scratches on the wall and leather headboard. Great location to the airport. Only 6 minutes away. No room service and that sucks. The best thing about this hotel is it is surroundings. Everything is there for the most part. Best thing ever is the Mellow Mushroom. A restaurant right across the street if you like drinks wings and what I consider the best pizza in Jacksonville. Mellow Mushroom makes this hotel a big possibility on my next visit to Jvile.

Nice hotel. Due to my return flight being cancelled I needed a hotel. I found Aloft to be a great pet friendly hotel close to the airport. Staff were so friendly and welcoming. The only negative for me was the TV reception. Other than that the room was clean and comfortable.

Great place to stay with a pet. I appreciate how pet friendly Aloft is and this property was no exception. To be able to travel to a nice hotel and pay no extra pet fees sets this property apart from the rest. The hotel staff was great and the location worked well for us. We were traveling north on I95 and wanted to avoid morning rush hour traffic. This hotel is north enough of the city center that our morning departure was a breeze. Like other reviewers we found the rooms a bit dated but everything was tidy and clean. The hotel was peaceful the beds were comfortable and we were happy to get a good nights sleep.

This place is tired. The room 306 was damp with thermostat set at ° 70. We had to turn it down to 68 to take the moisture out of the room but it made the room way to cold so we stuck with being damp. The bench in the room had dried stuff all over it. We stayed far away from it. Lastly the carpeting was stretched and bunched up in places making it look really drab. I will say I liked the theme of the place. it is upbeat and fun but for 149 I expected it to be worth it. Sadly it was not. 93AM. I guess it is time to get out because the hammering sawing and drilling came on with a vengeance in the room above us. Thanks God we were leaving anyway.
